website_summaries.verdict: The perfect option for customers wanting a medium- sized teddy to fit into compact living spaces.
pros: Large enough to hug and snuggle while remaining small enough to store away
cons: Bear is shipped in small box, making the ribbon crinkled and inner stuffing lumpy

customer_reviews.title: She loves it: ) Tip: throw a dryer ...
customer_reviews.text: She loves it :) Tip: throw a dryer sheet in the dryer with this and spin it for 15 minutes on low heat. This will fluff the bear up big time making it look 30% bigger. Also will make it a lot more fluffy fleeing.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed. The bear was stuffed in a little box
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed. The bear was stuffed in a little box. His ribbon was all messed up. The bear did not fluff up correctly. His stuffing was smashed. I used to get this bear from FAO Schwatz and there is no comparison on the presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent but not great
customer_reviews.text: The fur is definitely not "very plush" - it's fairly thin and not really fluffy. The stuffing is also on the lighter side of full, so if you like your plush animals really floppy this might be a good choice for you. Also since it arrives crammed into a small box the neck ribbon is all crumpled and doesn't look half so nice as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Bear as a present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bear as a present for my niece. She loves it. it is almost the same height as her. It feels soft and fluffy. Seeing her happy with it is worth it and I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Simpleofmind

customer_reviews.title: My Ex still loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Lol my ex still loves it even though we aren't together anymore, hell, she loves the damn thing more than she loved me
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: A toddlers dream
customer_reviews.text: We got this bear for our daughters third birthday and she loves it. He is just as fluffy and soft as you'd expect and the best par is he doesn't shed like I expected. I had read reviews saying he was crushed in transit so we took him out of the box a couple days before her birthday. His head was squished and he had a couple wrinkles where he'd been folded but they smoothed out pretty quick once he was fluffed and was perfect by the event.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Size it's not how it was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The package came on time, but the bear was squeezed in a very small box. It was very disappointing that the size of the bear was not 30"as advertised, but 27" I ordered this for my grand daughter's Birthday and she wanted a BIG BEAR! I thought the 30" would be perfect for her and 3" shorter makes a difference! I am very disappointed that it's not how it was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of the Joon 30" Teddy bears to dress in costume for a corporate event. Perfect size to dress in toddler clothing. Adorable faces, soft and cuddly. The colors I ordered are spot on. I gave only four stars for value because in some places the "fur" is just a tad skimpy, but not a big deal, but for $35 I feel the bear shouldn't have any almost bare spots.
customer_reviews.author: Annepi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect huggable size, even for adult.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect huggable size, even for an adult. Outside is sweetly soft. The bear is like a very soft pillow - I would have liked it to be just a little bit firmer. In fact, it does make a soft pillow or a pretty room decoration if you can stop hugging it long enough. Perfect for an adult dealing with an illness or otherwise needing comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but a bit squishy
customer_reviews.text: These bears are very cute. I purchased one for my grandson to replace an older one that was falling apart. The only downside is it could use just a bit more and/or firmer polyfill. It's a wee bit limp compared to the older one. Still, is a lovable stuffed toy.
customer_reviews.author: oomowmow

customer_reviews.title: We gave it as a gift and she absolutely loved it. We had Mom throw it in the ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave it as a gift and she absolutely loved it. We had Mom throw it in the dryer on ultra low heat for 20 minutes and it fluffed it right up in no time. When she took it out of the box, it was kind of floppy and saggy and kind of flat. That is why I recommended the time in the dryer. What a difference it made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and huge and ever so cuddly
customer_reviews.text: He is the best. He is soft and cuddly and HUGE. He was ever seen many times and featured on many facebook pages and profiles for a bear hunt we have here in Oklahoma. He is a star.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift. Perfect timing.
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter LOVES it! I found out at the very last minute that she wanted a larger than life Teddy Bear. I was hurrying trying to find one without having g to brace gbe crowds. AND THERE IT WAS! I ordered it and it was here within 24 hours. Talk about service! The quality of the bear is five stars too. This is something that is so big and soft I see her laying around on it. Thank you for making her Christmas extra special.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnie Myers

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bear, is soft, the color is very real as see in the pics. The only thing negative is not too big like the pic show it. But, it is perfect for little ones and of course for grown ups too.
customer_reviews.author: Crysty

customer_reviews.title: Huggable Bear
customer_reviews.text: They did a great job packing this in a box. When you see the bear packed in a air tight sealed bag and take it out. Don't freak out! Give it time to get air in the bear. It'll look great after a few days. It's super soft and you can definitely cuddle with this bear. My little one loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Y.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone LOVES this Bear!
customer_reviews.text: This large, cuddly-soft and light-weight bear is the perfect companion for my adult friend who is recovering from heart surgery. The bear was a big hit with the doctors and nurses while my friend was in ICU. The bear arrived the day before her surgery, and we thought it best to wash him in cold water and light detergent to make sure he'd be germ-free(!) He survived the dryer extremely well and his bow unwrinkled nicely. Score!
customer_reviews.author: laura goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Bear
customer_reviews.text: I received this bear well within the shipping timeframe. It came in a plastic bag within a box. This was a gift for my girlfriend so of course I had to inspect it first... When I got it out it was as soft as could be. Good quality and a cute design. She's had it since February and its holding up well and she loves it. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Zach L

customer_reviews.title: but mine had no issues looking like a normal bear
customer_reviews.text: A few reviews said it didn't get puffy, but mine had no issues looking like a normal bear.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old twins love their bears
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old twins love their bears. They are almost the same size as them ands they are cuddly and soft and perfect snuggle buddies. The customer service is great and i am extremely pleased. I would definitely recommend this bear for your little cuties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it! My main concern was if it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 9-month-old niece. It is very soft, love it! My main concern was if it's not loosing the fur that baby can choke on. Seem to be pretty good quality. I didn't measure the size so I'm not sure if it is as big as stated. I would only wish for it to be a bit firmer to keep the shape better.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Super soft! very well made with lots of stuffing, no need to add more to fill it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Valentine's Day gift and it's perfect. As soon as it came out of the box we put it in the dryer on the fluff setting for 10 min and it was perfect. I was really happy that I didn't have to add any filling to it. It's the cutest bear and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: HanFam

customer_reviews.title: Shop else where!
customer_reviews.text: 35.00 Teddy 🐻 fresh out the box, missing half of lip (very poor sewing). Not to mention I'm just opening 2 days before CHRISTMAS! Not Happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Meoshia | Charles

customer_reviews.title: Non premium Bear.
customer_reviews.text: looks nothing like the picture came in a Chinese box that was way to small. Does not look like the picture at all. Not plush, nothing about this bear is premium.
customer_reviews.author: GAMBIT

customer_reviews.title: Huggable and soft
customer_reviews.text: I liked the largness of the bear. Heis quite cute and huggable. I bought it for a class I teach. I taught this first grade class about Voting. They voted on a class mascot and it turned out to be a teddy bear. I presented it to the class today and the class voted on his name.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Torelli

customer_reviews.title: Sweet baby!!️
customer_reviews.text: A little small for an adult to sleep with... but my children love him.
customer_reviews.author: marlene ranejat

customer_reviews.title: i could have better spent the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok as a gift for my niece...other then that, i could have better spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leanette

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: What a treat to have this bear. He is so very soft & just the right size for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Huggable soft.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and adorable. Shocked how tiny package was when it came but fluffed up to size
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Big and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: So big and soft. We take our baby girls picture with it every month.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect soft bear for her to hug and hang on ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom is in a nursing home with the last stage of dementia. She leans forward much of the time in her wheel chair. This is the perfect soft bear for her to hug and hang on to. I named her Promise.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Shelton

customer_reviews.title: She likes to suck on it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece and she LOVES IT. She likes to suck on it? Idk man, babies?? Whatever, she's like 5ish months old and my sister likes it bc it keeps the baby quiet and I like it because TINY BABY GIANT BEAR. I mean, really, what's not to like??
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M.

customer_reviews.title: Stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to the new grandchild. Older sister thinks it’s hers they love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bear, minimal stuffing
customer_reviews.text: Any less poly fill in this stuffed bear and it would buckle over, permanently limp. I fluffed it a lot before getting it to sit upright. Otherwise, the materials and construction seem solid enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joey O

customer_reviews.title: I bought a 2T t-shirt "I love my Daddy" for my BabyGirl
customer_reviews.text: Affordable oversized medium Teddy. Can't beat the price for how big it is.. I bought a 2T t-shirt "I love my Daddy" for my BabyGirl. She loves it. Daddy is happy
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Everybody Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Everybody had to feel and touch it. So soft and cuddly. It was a gift for a very sick friend.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for dogs and Toddlers!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bear is tenderly loved by its new owner. Beautiful and comfy

customer_reviews.title: Soft, fluffy and adorable.
customer_reviews.text: I was scared at first because it came vacuum sealed. After a few minutes it fluffed up and was adorable. Really cute and soft.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bear!
customer_reviews.text: He was in a tiny box but fluffed up to be a perfect teddy bear! So soft and cuddly

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: To begin, the bear is only 24" and not 30". It is very loosely stuffed.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bear!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweet big guy! Excellent quality and great price. He’s soft and fur is super nice.

customer_reviews.title: Just Perrfect
customer_reviews.text: This teddy bear is perfect. i bought this for my girlfriend as a surprise gift and she loved it. it is big and well made and the stuffing was very good, it was used as a pillow by me for quite some time before i gave it to her and now she uses it too.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, good looking, maybe a little bit overpriced - amazing gift, recommended

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my daughter she is 7. She loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter she is 7. She loves it and uses it as a big pillow, bear is almost as big as her.
customer_reviews.author: Shay John

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Ripped within 2 months. I have no kids. It sat on my bed.

customer_reviews.title: FALSE PRODUCT INFO
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for a friend. Extremely disappointed, dissatisfied, and disgusted that the description claiming that this was 30” truly only meant 24”! Over priced. False description!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing teddy for a present
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift. She loves the product and sleeps with it every night. Very comfortable, smooth anf fluffy. Ideal for a present.
customer_reviews.author: Yago Uzquiano

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made bear
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made bear. Just a note, however...this bear is not stuffed fully. It is pretty squishy especially in the belly area, so if you like that great, but if you're looking for a fully stuffed animal you may want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cuddling size teddy bear
customer_reviews.text: Made my girlfriends day when I have her this bear! It is a fantastic size, fills up your arms and is great to cuddle with. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bear. It was a gift and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy bear buyer
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it, she said it was a perfect gift... i didn't measure mine but it is well over 2 feet tall, he needed a little fluffing up after he was removed from his box, his fur is very soft and the construction quality and materials are great. we're very happy and he arrived a day early.
customer_reviews.author: s clark Moab

customer_reviews.title: Flat, not fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Poor guy arrived in a very small box and looked like a deflated baloon...

customer_reviews.text: It is not 30 inches, I measured it and it was 24 inches - 6 inches short. I am very frustrated. Don't buy!

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and cuddly! My daughter sleeps with it every night. Really soft, perfect size. Happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.text: i like it, it just i wish it could have been big then it came. It doesn't look big as it looks from the picture. but my friend love it that what counts.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my wife and my little girls took it hostage. Everyone loved it.

customer_reviews.title: MY wife has a smaller version and we thought this would make a good Valentine's gift
customer_reviews.text: This item was for a friend of my wife and myself. MY wife has a smaller version and we thought this would make a good Valentine's gift. It did and our friend enjoyed her new BIG TEDDY BEAR. A gift is given and received if the spirit is within the act.

customer_reviews.title: A Little Picky But Still Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend as a small surprise gift but once I seen it I returned it instead. Firstly, the bear I received measured about 27-28 inches; and if you read other reviews, the bears others have received ended up being smaller than advertised as well. Secondly, certain spots around the edge of stitching the fur looked like it was coming off and probably would over time. The fur seemed to have bald rows where fur should have been placed. The wildness of the fur kind of hides it. You can honestly buy a better bear at a local store for the same price. Pro: Soft fluffy fur Cons: Smaller than advertised, not well crafted
customer_reviews.author: Trusty Penguin

customer_reviews.title: A Really Sweet Teddy!

product_meta.title: Big Teddy Bear 30" - Tan
feature_bullets: ❤️ This adorable JOON Bear is about 28" inches of huggable, loveable joy! Complete with a ribbon on his neck, this big best friend will look great in any bedroom or playroom.
